overview: Henry Latham and town Mayor Colton continue their misadventures in Smalltown, America. This time, twelve-year-old David Latham is testifying at the trial of his father, Henry, who is accused of burning down the McCluskey bridge.
tagline: IT'S THAT LOVABLE LAUGHABLE LATHAM FAMILY...IN THEIR SECOND HILARIOUS HIT!
title: Leave It to Henry
